show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Stock Market Is Folding Like An iPhone 6

title: The Stock Market Is Folding Like An iPhone 6
content:
The government’s and the media’s desperate efforts to paint lipstick on pigs. <!--more--> They claim consumer spending will save the day, conveniently forgetting that the “consumer”has neither money, assets nor borrowing power.
This does not stop the powers-that-be trying to coax them into spending money they do not have on things they can ill-afford.
These monsters are the drug-equivalent of enablers on steroids.
They lie through their teeth and there’s not a damned thing you can do about it (except leave!
) The current AIG trial.
Well, well worth reading the transcript.
It reads like a detective story.
You get a fascinating insight into the mindsets of these government crooks.
Houston has issued subpoenas demanding pastors turn over any sermons dealing with homosexuality, gender identity or the mayor, lesbian, Annise Parker.
And then there’s the story of the ‘Attack Team’ that roughed up the wrong family, brutalizing and arresting them and then charging them with assaulting police officers.
This just might not have happened if they’d been living in, say, Malaysia or Costa Rica.
America creates its own enemies which is bound to have significant negative effects everywhere.
Support for Nigel Farage’s UKIP party in the UK is surging.
Starbucks baristas have been forbidden to write the names of its customers on its polystyrene cups at a branch near the CIA.
(Could be outing an agent, you see…)
